sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
[A] caveat for wives to love their husbands or, Pleasant news from hell. Written in Italian by that grand politician Nicholas Machiavel and now translated into English for a Christmas-gigg. Machiavelli, Niccolò, 1469-1527.
[12] p.
[s.n.], London : printed in the year 1660.
Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
